title: Woman in tears after losing a day's wage to attend PM Modi's rally, was promised Rs 400, paid only 150
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
A video is currently viral on social media which shows a woman in tears while claiming that she skipped her daily wage job to attend Modi’s rally upon being promised Rs 400 for her attendance. She claims that she was paid only Rs 150 instead of the promised Rs 400. Watch the video below:

In the video, the lady says that she was asked to skip work for the day and go to the rally instead and raise slogans and for that she’ll be paid Rs 400 and a dhoti. When she was asked as to which party’s rally did she attend, she said “Modi ka” (Modi’s party). She further goes on to state that she skipped work, started for the rally at 8:30 a.m. and raised the slogans she was asked to at 10 a.m. However, after the rally, she was paid only Rs 150.
